resources.name: supplementary-file-b-kba-priority-table

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the Key Biodiversity Area as defined in the original data set
fields.title: KBA name

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country where the KBA is located
fields.title: country

fields.name: priority-rank
fields.description: Priority ranking of the unprotected part of the KBA in terms of increasing the representation of threatened Amphibians, Birds and Mammals in the global protected area network
fields.title: KBA priority rank

fields.name: area-km2
fields.description: Area of the KBA, calculated from the rasterized KBA dataset. For details see the main text.
fields.title: area (km2)

fields.name: percentage-protected
fields.description: Percentage of the KBA surface area that is protected. Protection level is calculated by overlapping the rasterized KBA and PA data sets. For details see the main text.
fields.title: percentage of surface protected

fields.name: mean-hii
fields.description: Mean Human influence index for the unprotected part of the KBA. For details see the main text.
fields.title: mean human influence index

fields.name: priority-set
fields.description: Indicates if the KBA belongs to the top priority set of KBAs as defined in the paper. For details see the main text.
fields.title: priority set

resources.title: KBA priority table
resources.description: Thisis a supplementary file for Kullberg, P., Di Minin, E. & Moilanen, A. 2019, "Using Key Biodiversity Areas to guide effective expansion of the global protected area network" . The file contains Priority ranking of all uprotected Key Biodiversity Areas. For detailed description of data and the prioritization method see the main article.

name: supplementary-file-b
title: supplementary-file-b

The file contains Priority ranking of all uprotected Key Biodiversity Areas. For detailed description of data and the prioritization method see the main article.
